entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Template code files does not have consistent BOM #41433
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 Preview 5, Creating 6.0/8.0 Blazor WASM requires July Servicing (8.0.7/6.0.32) feeds. #41432
  • <AnalysisLevel>recommend</AnalysisLevel> fails with meaningless error #41431

Closed

  • [MAUI][Multi-Project] Downloading the .NET9.0 SDK causes the original .NET8.0 SDK to disappear when creating a project #41280
  • [NetSDKE2E][ARM64]Although we installed the .netcoreapp 3.1 runtime, Test still executed failed and show "You must install or update .NET to run this application...". #41258
  • CLI's --list-runtimes doesn't work well with UTF-8 characters #17451
    Backlog
  • dotnet list package --outdated should list newer versions of pre-release packages #41442
  • [NETSDKE2E]"Unhandled exception. System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly..." show in Output after running "dotnet test --arch x86." #41256
  • Error during dotnet workload restore: Authenticode Signature Verification Failed #41286
  • The latest .NET 9.0 SDK form designer cannot load #41250

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert TestPackage creation changes #41451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Dispose ZipArchive after usage in ExtractArchiveToDirectory #41449
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41448
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix a leak of ProjectCollection in dotnet-add-reference #41447
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add tab completion for 'dotnet nuget why' command #41430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • restore older WarningLevel default behavior based on AnalysisLevel #41427
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-bootstrap with Preview 6 SDK #41417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Import StaticWebAssets SDK only for browser-wasm #41306
    Area-WasmSdk
  • Remove usage of `ComHostCustomizationUnsupportedOSException` #41424
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • [Blazor] Fingerprint all assets #41244
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add test for IlcLinkServerGC #40823
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • source-build: bundle NativeAOT libraries with the SDK. #41198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Ensure all template code files have UTF-8 BOM #41376
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
